name: Battle Dustmites Training
description:
This is a Text Based Game series, in this package deal you will get a Battle Dustmites Training which gets you battle shards & in game currencies for all other joint games!

Battle Dustmites Training, is a game kinda like Idle RPG, all you do is fire it up and it works for you saving/updating your new shards & currency you collect every 5 mins! You get 0-6 Stat shards every 5 Mins, which can be converted into stats when you get 100 of them or sell a batch of 100 shards for 1 gold, you also get 1-2 Copper every 5 Mins, it translates every 30 Copper to 1 Silver, 30 Silver to 1 Gold, 30 Gold to 1 Diamond! You do the math!

Mobs will be coming out in later games, but for now as I get those up for you just collect game currency while watching a movie or while you work for real stats or currency lols or play another game and in no time I will have new game files and games that will overall add to the whole game!

If you want crafting involved I can get that rolling

You actually have the option if you want your password to access the game deactivated or reactivated again, this is for users who are gonna be the only ones playing the game, having your password deactivated does not delete it!

Character rescue is now enabled! Enjoy! :)

Check out my other game in this series :) https://sarainia.itch.io/auto-currency-miner
